snippet: The appliance manufacturer is betting on price increases, tighter cost controls and a leaner inventory to offset weak demand in 2012
lead_paragraph: The appliance manufacturer is betting on price increases, tighter cost controls and a leaner inventory to offset weak demand in 2012

headline.main: Whirlpool Posts 20% Profit Gain and Predicts Strong 2012
